statements: DELETE FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE subject_line = 'Special Offer';
DELETE FROM ab_testing_campaigns WHERE subject_line = 'Welcome Email' AND content LIKE '%discount%'
DELETE FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE opens > 100 AND clicks < 50;
DELETE FROM email_designs WHERE design_name = 'Special Offer Design';
DELETE FROM email_subject_lines WHERE subject_id = 100 AND subject_line = 'Welcome Email';
DELETE FROM ab_test_results WHERE subject_id = 200 AND test_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM subject_lines WHERE is_tested = TRUE;
DELETE FROM email_content WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND design_id = 5;
